title: How to Make Chocolate Coconut Cream Pudding

steps.headline: Mix them together well in a bowl making sure that there are no clusters.
Add more ingredients of whatever you feel that there is not enough of.
steps.description: Every person likes it differently. Some people like it with heaps of hazelnut and some people like it very sugary.

steps.headline: Adjust the ingredients to your tastes.

text: Gather all the ingredients.  Mix them together well in a bowl making sure that there are no clusters.  Add more ingredients of whatever you feel that there is not enough of. Every person likes it differently. Some people like it with heaps of hazelnut and some people like it very sugary. Eat it with a spoon.  Adjust the ingredients to your tastes.  Refrigerate any leftovers. (there won't be many!)
